text:
1
ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
Our thanks to Mr. David A. Smith, Radio Instructor in the
Department of Speech for his valuable assistance in prepar¬
ing this survey and in instructing students in its object¬
ive use. We are grateful also for the patient cooperation
of the listeners interviewed and the fine students who
have each year made such surveys possible and have found
them valuable for their own understanding of radio broad¬
casting problems.
H, J. Skornia
June, 1949
